title: Drawn in Blood
description: In Drawn in Blood, the eagerly-awaited sequel to her electrifying thriller Twisted, New York Times bestselling author Andrea Kane brings back the dynamic team of former federal agent Sloane Burbank and her lover, FBI Special Agent Derek Parker. A n unrelentingly gripping page-turner, this masterwork of romantic suspense embroils a richly drawn cast of characters in a nerve-shattering case of old crimes and new terrors—of secrets, passion, and lies—where the stakes are intensely personal and the lines separating friend and foe, protector and betrayer, are Drawn in Blood.
author: Andrea Kane
